translation.title: Hi, welcome, my name is

translation.text: I started my studies at QI Faculdade & Escola TÃ©cnica, and it was there that I had my first contact with programming, which sparked my interest and made me really enjoy the area. I'm currently a full-stack developer and I'm looking for my first experience in the job market.
